author: Paul Schwartzman
title: You’re from where? Pandemic stigmatizes New Yorkers fleeing city. - The Washington Post

content:
My workers are very leery of New Yorkers, he said.
In the fickle calculus of what defines fashionable, New Yorkers have always been a constant, the seen-it-all sophisticates whose idea of normalcy includes riding an impossibly overcrowded subway and inhabiti… [+8119 chars]
